description: Predicted AGI signposts based on AI 2027 scenario timeline

predictions.label: Agentic Coding 70%
predictions.rationale: AI 2027 predicts autonomous coding agents achieving 70%+ on real-world GitHub issues by mid-2025

predictions.label: Agentic Coding 85%
predictions.rationale: Near-human expert performance on software engineering benchmarks expected by early 2026

predictions.label: OS-Level Tasks 65%
predictions.rationale: Complex OS-level task automation reaching 65% success by late 2025

predictions.label: OS-Level Tasks 85%
predictions.rationale: Near-human proficiency on OS tasks projected for mid-2026

predictions.label: Web Navigation 70%
predictions.rationale: Autonomous web navigation and task completion reaching 70% by end of 2025

predictions.label: PhD-Level Science 75%
predictions.rationale: PhD-level science question answering at 75% accuracy by end of 2025

predictions.label: PhD Expert Parity
predictions.rationale: Reaching PhD expert parity (85%) on GPQA Diamond by late 2026

predictions.label: Multi-step Agent 80%
predictions.rationale: Reliable multi-step task completion by autonomous agents reaching 80% by early 2026

predictions.label: 1e26 FLOP Training Run
predictions.rationale: First 1e26 FLOP training run expected by early 2025 (already achieved or imminent)

predictions.label: 1e27 FLOP Training Run
predictions.rationale: Scaling to 1e27 FLOPs projected for mid-2026 based on current buildout

predictions.label: 1 GW Datacenter
predictions.rationale: First 1 GW AI datacenter cluster expected by end of 2025 (xAI, Meta commitments)

predictions.label: 10 GW Datacenter
predictions.rationale: 10 GW clusters projected for 2027-2028 timeframe based on infrastructure plans

predictions.label: +2 OOM Algorithmic Efficiency
predictions.rationale: 100x improvement over 2020 baseline expected by late 2025 (9-month doubling)

predictions.label: Security Level 2
predictions.rationale: Inference monitoring deployment expected by early 2026 as capabilities advance

predictions.label: 10% Job Displacement
predictions.rationale: Economic displacement of 10% of remote knowledge work projected for late 2026
